connection.path_tooltip: Here you need to select the CK3 folder where your user data are stored, not where the game files are! By default it stored in your user documents, inside the Paradox interactive folder

actions.use_same_api: Use the same API as in the connection tab
actions.select_actions: Select which actions you want the mod to detect:

summarization.use_same_api: Use the same API as in the connection tab

prompts.suffix_tooltip: If enabled, suffix prompt is inserted as the last (system) message before sending the API request, it's useful for jailbreaking, or instructing the model on how to format the response message.
prompts.narrative_tooltip: This prompt is used to generate AI narrative descriptions after actions are triggered. The narrative provides atmospheric descriptions of events in the game.
prompts.scene_description_tooltip: This prompt is used to generate the initial scene description at the start of conversation. It provides background and atmosphere for character interactions.
prompts.restore_tooltip: Click this button to restore all prompts to their default values
prompts.scripts_tooltip: Some prompts are too advanced to be made up by static texts, they require script files that dynamically writes the prompts based on the ingame variables.

settings.clean_tooltip: The mod will try to remove parts of the messages that the llm shouldn't have generated, like emojis
settings.shuffle_tooltip: Randomize the order in which characters generate messages in multi-character conversations. Note: If enabled, the speaking order of each character will be random, which may lead to confusion in the LLM's output character identity.
settings.dynamic_tooltip: Use LLM to analyze conversation and select the next character to speak. The LLM will choose from a pool of characters who haven't spoken yet in the current round.
settings.validate_tooltip: When streaming is disabled and there are more than 2 characters, validate that the generated message matches the character's identity. If validation fails, regenerate up to 3 times.
settings.show_suggestions_tooltip: Show or hide the suggestions button in the chat window. Controls whether to display the recommended input statements feature.
settings.generate_scene_tooltip: Generate scene description at the start of conversation to provide context and background for characters.
settings.auto_suggestions_tooltip: When enabled, suggestions will be automatically generated at the start of conversation and after each round of dialogue.
settings.auto_send_tooltip: When enabled, selecting a suggestion will automatically send the message without clicking the send button.

system.check_on_startup_desc: VOTC - Community Edition will automatically check for new versions when the application starts.
system.early_access_desc: VOTC - Community Edition will automatically be updated to pre-release versions as well.
system.logs_desc: If you experience errors/crashes, send the logs to our discord server
system.clear_summaries_desc: This will delete the summaries of previous conversations of all characters
